channel.title: Runserver window opens and closes on its own, on my VPS
channel.description: I recently purchased a VPS, and whenever i run the runserver, it just closes really quickly. I try to resolve the problem by dling JDK 6 Update 11 but that didn't work. so, if anyone knows how to fix this problem please help :)

item.title: Runserver window opens and closes on its own, on my VPS
item.dc:creator: @i_scary_i i scary i
item.description:
@i_scary_i wrote:

Is it just a black CMD box? or Does it say something? Right click Run.bat>Edit> and put a pause at the very bottom. The Tell us or screeny what it says.

Read full topic
item.source: Runserver window opens and closes on its own, on my VPS

item.title: Runserver window opens and closes on its own, on my VPS
item.dc:creator: @ProjectDiabolus ProjectDiabolus
item.description:
@ProjectDiabolus wrote:

What VPS Are you using? And make sure you have a Pause at the end of your .bat file.
